name: Chance of the Dead
description: Five years after her demise, Janet Burdie is granted a "night out" to make her greatest wish come true: Submitting her signature cake to the famous C3 baking competition!

name: Charlie Foxtrot & The Galaxy of Tomorrow
description:
A rebel clone meets a zany galaxy in this high-intensity sci-fi parody. Hundreds of animations, spectacular humour, full sound-track and a bunny's lair worth of easter eggs make this game a must play!

You play Charlie Foxtrot, a clone who rebels against conformity. Undertaking an intergalactic quest so that he can assert his autonomy, Charlie travels to strange planets inhabited by dozens of parodied sci-fi characters. The humour is somewhere between Space Quest and Red Dwarf, but the adventure is beyond comparison.

name: America: Expansion Pack
description: Each of the four factions from the original game gets two new missions, a new unit, and a new building. The graphics and AI have been updated and GameSpy online support is now included. There is also a level editor for creating your own missions.

name: Build & Battle
description: Build&Battle is a turn-based tower defense with classic rts base building elements. Build your maze of towers, lay out your plan of attack and execute it with the next turn.

name: Drowned Helicopter
description: Drowned Helicopter is a 2d side-scroller game in which the player controls a helicopter, rescuing residents from flooding, dodging tall buildings, flying debris, and escaping from a downpour, he must be able to survive to the end.

name: Lost Kittens: Maze Garden
description: Find and save the kittens lost in the maze. This is a cute and relaxing game, but it will challenge your memory and hand coordination.

name: The Dark Way
description: The Game Revolves around a person who had an accident on a road and around a mysterious village find out by yourself what is happening!

name: Viral Firar
description: Viral Virar is an arcade running game. Try to reach the longest distance using the features of different YouTubers, earn more with each run and improve your characters.

name: Bad Bots Battle Arena
description: Enjoy Battle Bot Style Of Robot Fighting In Wide Battle Arena!

name: Clarence Goes to the F%ing Store
description: An absurdist comedy choose-your-own-adventure game featuring a massive cast of bizarre characters, notebook-doodle visuals, and 7 crazy endings! As you embark on your quest to go to the store, the denizens of this zany town will seek your help with their insane problems.

name: NeverDeath
description: NeverDeath is a fighting game set in our own solar system centuries in the future. Explore the intricacies of the unique left/right fighting system while battling across the solar system as nine distinct characters.

name: Mrs. Fantastic's Freaky Figurine Shop
description: Three lost souls find themselves stuck as figurines in a toy maker’s shop. They must use their new found bodies, a bear, a tiger, and a monkey, to escape the circus themed toy shop and return to their previous selves. Can they work together to find a way out?

name: Lullaby Days
description: Fairy fantasy simulation 『Lullaby Days』 is a game where the goal is to grow a duckling girl into a hero. Your duckling girl will grow through education, part-time work, exploration, and more. Create 70 endings in the Kingdom of Oberebach with around 90 sub-characters.

name: The Clockwork Labyrinth
Spaceship Trouble
description: Hey, pilot! Our spaceship get in trouble! We are in a dangerous place full of asteroids and pirates! Can you save your spaceship captain?

name: Alien Hunt
description: Alien hunt - Take on the role of an alien who loves to hunt for jewels in this extraordinary platformer! Climb deeper into the caves and collect all the gems, but beware of vampires who will be very unhappy that someone disturbed their peace.

name: Skeleton Troubles
description: Skeleton troubles - This platformer will put on your shoulders an unusual task - resurrect your skeleton hero, collecting bones and hearts in the dungeon so that he regains his strength and teach all his enemies a lesson. Jump over the spikes, dodge the cunning slugs that will shoot at you and run to victory!

name: Lode Runner
description: A remake of Lode Runner, developed by Tozai and Southend Interactive, was released on April 22, 2009. The game features revamped 3D graphics, additional game modes, cooperative and competitive multiplayer support, six new block types and a level editor, as well as live leaderboards and a timeline of the game's history.

name: Marble Mage
description: Dash and roll your way through 60 fast-paced levels to try and find the way back home after a magic exam goes wrong, leaving a young mage stranded in a strange dimension. Marble Mage offers classic marble-rolling platforming with a unique twist: Charge up and release to blast off in any direction!

name: Origins of Merlin: Muscles and Magic
description: A puzzle platformer set in the days of yore, when King Arthur was just a boy. Play as a young Merlin on a quest to climb up a treacherous tower to reach Excalibur, the legendary sword on the top floor, and save the kingdom!

name: Park the Car
description: Park the car is a racing game where you need to park your cars in a safe location!

name: The Lost Labyrinth
description: After waking up, Sophie finds herself in an eerie place and sets out to free tormented creatures and, discover if this is real or just a nightmare! Dive into a breathtaking match-3 adventure as you find your path through the cursed labyrinth and fight the dark forces that appose all who enter.

name: Zombie Slayer
description: A round-based zombie survival game. Purchase weapons, power-ups, and other items to survive.

name: I Am Fly
description: A fly lives a short time, so collect poop and become a fat fly OR Eat rotten poop and die before you are satisfied!

name: Kingdom of Atham: Crown of the Champions
description: A multiplayer survival game set in a dark fantasy world that is continuously expanding in the Atham universe. Fight and survive in a sandbox world, build your home, and dominate your enemies… or your friends!

name: Cold Meat
description: Pete is a lazy guy who lives in a small town in Bavaria and loves his music heavy metal and food fast. Finally the big day has come; the Smalltown Fast Food Fortress opens, and Pete knows just what do to: Get those burgers, and get them quick and in high quantity! Arriving at the chain restaurant of his choice, he can't help but notice one big problem: They built that thing on an ancient Celtic burial site, and now terrifying undead clan warriors from 500 B.C. have risen from their graves and occupied the Fast Food Fortress! And all they seek is merciless revenge, and all they crave is juicy human brain...or is it? Nominee for best puzzles in 2009.

name: Long Live Caesar
description: 44 BC. Caesar, dictaror of Rome, finds out that the threat of conspiracy comes from the people closest to him. Can you resist the impending danger and rewrite history?

name: Zombies Beyond Me
description: Here you can lie. Zombies Beyond Me is a deduction, survival, and third-person action game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Communication and teamwork are essential to win, either as a traitor or a survivor. Build, loot, discover, kill zombies (or people), and survive to win!

name: White Eyes
description: The universe implodes and interstellar nomads race to get back home. Galaxies and stars are violently pushed toward their home, threatening to destroy it and any nomads who get caught in their path. Survive rounds of relentless onslaught to secure survival of the nomads.

name: Buddi Bot: Your Machine Learning AI Helper With Advanced Neural Networking!
description: Buddi Bot is an isometric puzzle game where you must (re)train Buddi Bot, an advanced AI with neural network technology. With just a click, Buddi will complete tasks like washing dishes or cooking a steak, by learning COLORS and SHAPES. Are you prepared for the future? Play and find out.

name: The Way Home
description: The story of a driver who wants to go home

name: The Case of the Golden Idol
description: A new kind of detective game that allows you to think and investigate freely. Discover clues surrounding 12 strange and gruesome deaths and build your own theory. Pick your suspect, deduce the motive, unmask the awful truth.

name: Raging Fists: Retribution
description: Raging Fists: Retribution is an Action Fighting Game based in a sci-fi industrial era.

name: The Depths: Prehistoric Survival
description: The Depths is a Semi-realistic Prehistoric Survival MMO game, where the player can become a prehistoric creature of their choice from different environments such as swamps, oceans or plains. The Depths will heavily focus on aquatic creatures and their interactions with other creatures in their environment.

name: B.U.G. Force
description: B.U.G. Force is a TPS (third-person-shooter) VR Shoot ’Em Up, inspired by old space dog fight games from the early 90's. The game value navigational skills in combination with shooting accuracy and strategy in the same way as the original games.

name: Lumiland
description: A sokoban-like 3D puzzle game in a colorful, stylized world of light and shadow.

name: Jump/Die/Live
description: Are you ready to beat this game? 50 levels, 2 boss battles. In this unique 2d platformer, you can only move with the mouse, jump, slide, kill the enemies, solve the levels!

name: Faded Grey
description: A short find it game that helps you make sense of a tragic accident as you uncover a piece of the story with each item found.

name: Wonder Defense: Chapter Earth
description: Wonder Defense: Chapter Earth is a strategy game based on Earth and Aliens in which you act as a General to accomplish survive and move to Mars.

name: Your wife
description: You have been set a curse, and your looks are growing old very fast.You visit a master, who points you to a very dangerous path. You need to go to the four magic worlds to find the antidote to the curse, in which live many fierc

name: Forest Battle
description: You will encounter powerful enemies, but you can defeat them to obtain money or rewards, improve your stats or buy sellswords to fight together at your own choice, featured treasures and equipment can also make you more powerful. What are you waiting for? Come fight in the forest!

name: Brain Test
description: Interesting quizzes on various topics. Take the tests and learn a lot. Improve your knowledge.

name: Fading Afternoon
description: Seiji Maruyama is a middle-aged yakuza recently released from prison. Known as "Gozuki" (one of the demon generals from Buddhist mythology) he is the power that his oyabun counts on. But there is one thing his aniki is not taking into account: Maruyama is getting old.

name: Project Crimson
description: Project Crimson is a 2D action-arcade clicker where your movement is restricted to a straight line in front of you. Use objects to manipulate your movement and, with some luck and good timing, fly through 75 levels of fun and satisfying challenges. No advertisements, no microtransactions.

name: Speechless
description: Speechless is an "escape the loop" experience.

name: Mechatronika
description: Mechatronika is an adventure genre game with puzzle elements. The action in the game circles around steampunk and tells a tale of a time after a biological war, the consequences of which proved fatal for the biosphere of the planet.

name: Attack of the Evil Poop VR
description: "ATTACK OF THE EVIL POOP V.R." is the ultimate toilet experience, more frantic than ever! The crazy Windows and Mac title released last year on Steam, now has a V.R. version too! (Thank god the smell is not included... Yet!)

name: MotoRun
description: A great Biker on a small moped rushes to his dream, but what is it behind? A huge boulder has rolled down the mountain and is rolling right at us! Accelerate and rush forward, jumping, flying away and shooting everything that gets in your way!

name: Measurement Problem
description: Measurement Problem is a narrative driven puzzle platformer. The player finds himself in an abandoned facility, soon he realizes that he is not alone. Guided by Catherine, solve various puzzles with many different mechanics acquired during gameplay.

name: Boring Game
description: Become a big-time, full-fledged dentist in Boring Game - a simulator you’ve never seen before! Appear on the opposite side of the dentist’s chair and take care of your patients’ dentition to have a go at reaching the top of the dentist world!

name: Shark Slayer
description: Shark Slayer is a terrifying underwater wave-based horror survival game. Take on the horrors of the deep with up to 3 of your friends in online co-op.

name: MiniMap Kingdom
description: Build your own kingdom on unlimited mini maps!

name: The Arcane Tower
description: Immerse yourself into a hidden underworld where state of the art mechanics meets ingeniously crafted puzzles. Use the handcar to go through the mine and get face to face with the arcane tower.

name: Jester / King
description: You play the amnesiac jester Madion who woke up next to the king's lifeless body. A curse has fallen upon the kingdom, annihilating almost everyone, and driving the survivors to madness. Madion is torn between seeking the truth, helping the others, and a desire to escape.

name: Mayor of Defense
description: You are the village chief. Just when you thought the promised slow life was waiting for you... A monster that attacks without end! Almost a one-man operation! Black Village! Work to get materials, money and hire mercenaries to defend your village.

name: Maru and her make-believe world
description: Maru is a game about our childhood, it is about our sweet nostalgia of the kid’s life. This is a story-driven adventure quest in the imaginary world with exploration elements that will suit best for those who would like to chill and immerse in their own childhood memories.

name: Epejsodion Dodgeball Defense
description: Time to hit the parquet! EPEJSODION Dodgeball is a sports game, where YOU can lead over 100 powerful teams to victory! Play an extensive singleplayer campaign, hone your skills, then beat your friends!

name: Disaster Crisis
description: 《灾难危机》主要讲述外来生物人入侵地球，为解救快崩溃的世界，你将扮演幸存者、战士等角色，从安德烈亚斯城市开始，在冒险的旅程上解决阻止这场外来生物人入侵地球的大灾难。你将组建英雄的队伍，在地图上升级刷怪，购买搜刮最强武器装备，带领他们完成艰巨的任务，直到打倒最后的幕后敌人。

name: Lucky day
description: "Lucky day" is a remastered classic 2D arcade game. The main goal is to collect all the coins in a maze while running away from monsters.

name: Super Neo Tanks
description: Super Neo Tanks is an arcade style local multiplayer game where you battle it out in frantic, bullet-filled combat. Dodge, dash, and line up your shots to be the last tank standing!

name: EchoBlade
description: Venture forth in this puzzle-combat dungeon explorer. Blinded and trapped inside a dungeon tower, every sound you make illuminates your path to freedom. Danger lurks around every corner: trapdoors, chambers filled with toxic fumes, and halls patrolled by crusader knights are only the beginning.

name: Crawlyard
description: Welcome to the Mansion of Whispers. Build a card deck and use it to carve your path through its boundless dungeons. Send puppets to battle, collect mysterious relics, find the ideal room pattern to meet the Wishmaster. Will you have your own wish granted? Or will you choose to help someone else?

name: Yeoubul
description: A platform game where you collect items to clear the stage, avoid or defeat enemies, pass through traps, and clear the stage with a system (operation) that uses the natural principle that creates a shadow when light does not pass through an object.

name: HangOutGame
description: HangOutGame is a game about climbing. Sometimes it may be difficult because of different obstacles. You can use a rope with hook, a blaster and your agility. Your task is getting to the finish in each world. You can do it by yourself or unite with a friend.

name: Unlock the Block
description: In unlock the block your objective is to activate a button, but for that you will have to push your way through and destroy blocks. This may seem easy but know one thing your movement is limited.

name: YRek Lost In Portals
description: An Action-Adventure First Person Shooter, with big boss fights encounter and dungeon exploration. Fps inspired by the old Fps of the 1990s, Getting ammo, weapons, and health to survive the Adventure against enemy foes is the game about.

name: Dental Madness: Cavity Mania
description: Locate cavities and drill away cavity decay using the dental drill and mirror! Discover if you can complete levels of increasing cavity difficulty. Assist Toothy Chompy Guy patients in this first-person 3D dental/medical simulation.

name: Antimatter Elevator
description: Connect non-matching pieces to reach level 99.

name: Ahri and Bear
description: Ahri and Bear is a 3D puzzle adventure game, where players will take control of Ahri the cat and Bear the dog who embark on an emotional journey together to find their true home. Use Ahri and Bear's unique abilities to navigate through the daunting human world so they can find their way back home.

name: Swords of Time
description: A colorful fantasy world threatened by dark forces is in danger. Help defeat the threat with your allies and companions who join you on the way. This game allows deep character development that progresses with classes, skills, permanent huntings stats, equipment and more.

name: Sphere Arena
description: In Sphere Arena you take control of a ball to roll, jump or slide through non-linear levels in order to visit all checkpoints scattered across the maps in industrial setting. Improve your skill in singleplayer or compete with other players in multiplayer mode.

name: Wunderhaven
description: Welcome to Wunderhaven. You're the lone surviving descendant of a not-so-legendary line of peasants. You've been summoned to a failing kingdom in the hopes that your hard work can spur a new wave of wealth and prosperity. Will you replenish the coffers and save the kingdom?

name: Save the Pirate: Sea Story
description: An adventure game with logic challenges about a funny pirate

name: Mess Cleanup
description: Think you can find any item in a mess? Mess Cleanup challenges you! Search for items and move on to the next challenging levels. Collect points and use your limited time wisely.

name: Shadow Eclipse
description: Shadow Eclipse is an action roguelite dungeon crawler. Build up your mage with diverse spell builds and abilities each run. You can play the game alone, or join 5-player online coop.

name: Micro Abyss
description: Micro Abyss - action roguelike, in a subatomic procedurally generated universe. You, a descendant of an ancient deity, have to cleanse the Abyss from a rapidly spreading infection.

name: Curling on Line
description: Realistic Single Player, Local Multiplayer, online multiplayer Curling game.

name: Slimey Champions
description: Slimey Champions is all about hacking and slashing. Get loot, level up and learn new skills in this solo indie made action rpg.

name: Forsaken Universe
description: Once the cyborgs were created, it was only about time the universe became forsaken. Tasked on an exploration trip to a new planet, you find yourself on a very old, once inhabited planet by the human race. What comes next? You'll have to find out.

name: Mouse Dream
description: Mouse dream is a platformer game where all surroundings are continuously morphing from the clouds into the new forms and adventures. You are not running anywhere, all dreams come to you. Dream is the story. Dream as long as you can.

name: The Horrorscope: Fatal Awakening
description: You will answer a series of questions that will reveal your potential fate. These questions may make you uncomfortable, but with great knowledge comes great sacrifice. Can you make it all the way through The Horrorscope, and if you do, are you sure you want the answers you seek?

name: SlideNSlip
description: SlideNSlip is a cute, casual, and challenging top-down puzzle game, in which the goal is to maneuver Mac and his penguin friends around so that Mac can get to his jet ski and escape the icy island he's stuck on.

name: Far light
description: a game where all that matters is your choices and in the end not always the good ending for you will be the good ending for everyone and not even the worst ending will be the best ending for everyone

name: Zombie Hazard
description: A remotely operated lab by a group of mad scientists lead to an outbreak of a Hazardous zombie virus which is now on its way to infect the world, Now it's your duty to stop the zombies break out and stop it from spreading to the rest of the world.

name: Wild Ice
description: When the world froze over, humanity's final stand to survive is left to the blades of it's most unlikely heroes - small town hockey players. Play solo or local co-op as best friends Max and Finley as they take on the frost and whatever lurks within it. Welcome to the a-puck-alypse!

name: Rogue Randy
description: This game is a TOP-DOWN, horror RPG. Visibility is very limited... everything else pretty much isn't. Explore the map, collect power-ups, and see how high your score can get before you beat the game.

name: Concurrence
description: Concurrence is a so called cinematic platform game. Unlike other platform games you will know (like Super Mario Bros. or Sonic the Hedgehog), this game focuses on realistic movements, puzzles and a dense atmosphere. If you have played games like Prince of Persia, Another World, or Flashback, you will know what awaits you. Many of parts of the game will require precise jumping and you might feel a little frustrated at the beginning. But don't despair, study the movements described in the manual and keep on practicing and you will find that it isn't so hard after all (you also have unlimited continues).

name: Nautilus Epoch
description: On a small island in the Adriatic Sea lives a girl called Lily. Her world is turned upside down when she comes upon a strange sea shell. Upon making contact with it she finds herself in the future where the seas have all but vanished and fearsome creatures from the deep roam the surface.

name: Balrog
description: The dwarves have abandoned the ringing forges and roaring breweries of Vul Buhldar, and in their absence other, less savory things of the dark have taken up residence...

name: Hyde and Zeke
description: Hyde and Zeke is a stealth game about a boy using light magic to escape a dark castle. The stakes are higher though as a cloaked figure chases him through the castle.

name: Planet Zeta
description: Planet Zeta is a classic 2D platformer shooter with a side view. You play as an astronaut who made an emergency landing on an unknown planet. He needs to find the necessary spare parts for the ship to get off the planet. The planet is simply teeming with creatures that are hostile to the player.

name: Junkyard Truck
description: Junkyard Truck is an open-world off road driving and mechanic simulator. Build, upgrade, and maintain an old off road truck, then use it to complete difficult off road missions and challenges.

name: PalmRide
description: PalmRide is a fast-paced driving game inspired by classic games like OutRun or Rad Racer and the popular "outrun" style.

name: Sqr 2
description: Sqr 2 is logical platformer with hardcore elements. It contains 3 difficulty and 100+ levels with different gameplay on each level. The simple controls & many mechanics with logical problems make game process more interesting.

name: Turkey Hunting Unlimited
description: Get ready to hit the Spring time woods and Hunt Turkey! The Gobblers are out there and depending on the difficulty level you choose it can be a "Gobble Fest" or a more realistic hunt! Hunt four states: New York, Ohio, Kansas, and Texas! Hunt with a Gun or a Bow!

name: Sons of Valhalla
description: Sons of Valhalla is a side scrolling base building strategy game that catapults you into the age of the Vikings. You slip into the role of the Viking Jarl son Thorald Olavson, who is leaving for England to save the love of his life.

name: CardMaker
description: This is a Rogue + Hearthstone like card game, but also a card making tool, you can play in addition to the official cards, creative workshop players a variety of card DIY.

name: Dr. Byte
description: Dr. Byte is an adventure in the depths of a computer full of monster viruses. Fight against the system destroyers - it's all in a top-down game.

name: Idle Monster Frontier
description: Collect monsters and combine them to conquer the frontier in this challenging idle RPG.

name: Misha Adventures
description: Misha Adventures is a challenging platformer in which you have to help Misha the bear save the forest from pollution.

name: Kingdom of the Dead
description: Immerse yourself in a dreadful hand-drawn horror world and push Death’s armies back to the underworld!

name: Anetona
description: Embark on a quest across a multi-era world against humans, creatures and machines in order to rescue the princess from the evil red dragon.

name: BSF
description: Tired of the boringness of this world, three good sisters formed an adventure trio, ready to go to a place called BFS to explore, this place has been a long time no one has been, they are going to figure out why it is called BFS.

name: Later Daters: Part 2
description: Choose what happens next at the Oceanview Living Domicile for the Elderly, and smooch some sexy seniors.

name: Poly Synth Gunner
description: Instance-based shooter with scaling endless wave of enemies

name: Captain Disaster in: The Dark Side of the Moon
description: A comedy scif-fi point & click adventure game with several odd characters (all voiced by the same person) and multiple strange inventory objects to try out! References to classic sci-fi and point & clicks abound.

name: Lactea Volleyball
description: Lactea Volleyball is a game made to be simple and fun to play, choose or create your team and aim well to beat your opponents.

name: Escape to Moscow
description: A story about a guy, a girl he met, and their adventure. Freelance IT specialist Semyon meet a girl from Dagestan on the Internet. However, their relationship quickly grow over the regular chatting - he decides to help her run away from home. That is how their amazing adventure begins.

name: FallTower
description: 2D action game that aims to go up

name: Jump Hero: Beginning
description: Jump Hero: Beginning is a game in which you have to complete all levels, however each new level becomes more difficult and difficult. Can you complete all levels?

name: Breakout VR
description: Playing Brick Breaker in Virtual Reality

name: Dört Model Müzesi
description: Four model contents in public relations, which is one of the topics in public relations education, have been developed to support the educational process using virtual reality technology.

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Miraculous Dream - Collector's Edition
description: Who’s the fairest of them all?

name: Big Flappy Tower vs. Tiny Square
description: Fling, flip, and flap around a new delightfully difficult Big Tower game! No sprint and no floaty controls! Just quick deaths and generous respawn points. Can you reach the top of the tower and rescue your Pineapple?

name: Dormant: Episode Galatea #1
description: リンクス螺旋機関による縦スクロール型2Dシューティングゲーム第一作「Dormant - Episode Galatea #1 -」シンプルな操作とオートボム相当のドライヴでシューティングゲーム未経験者でも楽しめる作品を目指しています。装備によって主人公ガラテアの見た目と性能が分かれる。ショットとドライヴを駆使して自分なりのプレイスタイルを確立しよう。魅力的なキャラクターたちによるSFをお楽しみください。

name: Sokocat: Dungeon
description: kitten Jones adventure into a mysterious ancient temple on a volcanic island looking for relics, solving puzzles and avoiding dangers along the way. Does this cat have 9 lives?

name: Tres-Bashers
description: Tres-Bashers is a 2D monster-bashing adventure featuring a big interconnected map full of cryptids, secrets, and more! Find over 30 different monsters and whack 'em with your baseball bat!

name: Suddenly Meow
description: Tim is an adventurous cat who loves to explore mysterious places and is always hungry for more. In this Match3 adventure he is lost in a dark forest full of shadows and dangers lurking under the silent trees. Help Tim escape and restore peace to the forest!

name: Shanhe
description: Sin descripción

name: Bow Man
description: All you have to do is kill the monsters. Try to kill as many monsters as possible to make the highest score possible.

name: Chimeras: What Wishes May Come - Collector's Edition
description: Always Read the Fine Print

name: The Orb Chambers Remastered
description: The Orb chambers is back. Remastered and ready to take on new challengers.

name: SimBus
description: SimBus is new, advanced bus simulator. Drive historic and modern vehicles from all parts of the world. Visit living cities of USA, Europe and China in different eras. Become bus driver, follow the timetable and meet other players on multiplayer mode.

name: Idle Poker
description: A collaboration between Poker and idle game!! How is your luck?

name: Content
description:
Content is a point-and-click horror adventure game. Become Anthony, an influencer looking for provocative content for his videos. Investigate the cases, combine and use tools to overcome the given challenges. Sometimes you have to use your reflexes to dodge the threat of an unexpectedly attacking creatures.

The fate of the protagonist, Anthony, is in your hands.

name: Fast Cubes
description: Fast Cubes is a puzzle game with time limits. Your objective is to place the cubes in their respective slots. Pass through portals, avoid spikes and find keys to achieve your objective. You'll need to think and to act to win this game.

name: ProtoStone
description: ProtoStone is a card game with local split-screen multiplayer (Offline), 4 different classes and over 150 different cards to collect.

name: Star Rover
description: Star Rover is a Third-Person Action platformer game in Metroidvania style that you as the player can play in various locations on a planet. Upgrade yourself and collect a lot of weapons to prepare for the battle.

name: Dark Harvest
description: A stealth-horror game. An extra-terrestrial species has invaded earth. If you are seen, you will die. Armed with only a flickering flashlight and your wits, you must find the supplies and escape your farm before the mysterious creatures find you.

name: Mimir's Recruit
description: A feedback-based logic and deduction game set in the Nordic world. Face to face with the advisor of the gods, prove your worth and earn the right to drink from the well of knowledge.

name: Biocide: Karver Island
description: Biocide takes place on Karver Island. You have been hired to infiltrate a facility on the island and recover data linked to experiments done by Celledyne a global leader in pharmaceutical and biogenetics.

name: Indika
description: Play a third-person, story-driven game set in alternative Russia of the late XIX century where religious visions clash with harsh reality. INDIKA tells the story of a young nun who sets off on a journey of self-discovery with the most unusual companion by her side, the devil himself.

name: Mimicry
description: Mimicry is a minimalist 2D puzzle-platformer where you control 2 characters at once in 100 levels. However, one character's controls are inverted, so each level feels like a puzzle.

name: Fantasma Ville
description: Fantasma Ville is a wholesome puzzle-platformer game about guilt and redemption, where you control a memoryless ghost tasked to uncover why the village inhabitants and himself died.

name: No Honor
description: A pixel art style shooting adventure with challenging levels and bosses.

name: Toi
description: A new planet has been discovered, go through the three areas and conquer the planet Toi.

name: Liberation Mutagenix
description: Guide your comrades to freedom in this gravity-bending sci-fi puzzle game. Modify their genetic code, direct their movements, and provide them with the tools they need to escape.

name: Murder Diaries 2
description: In this game you abstractly follow the narration of a murderer and a joung detective through their lifes and thoughts. This leads you straight into the middle of an exciting murder case and a murder mystery unlike you have ever seen before unfolds.

name: Pixels: Digital Creatures
description: Pixels combines thrilling turn-based creature battles with the replayability of a roguelike. Pick your starter and journey through the Virtual World. Defy the odds by building a team of powerful Pixels to fight through the arenas! Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Pixel Coach?

name: The Mouse and the Cheese
description: An arcade-style strategy / maze game!! Collect all the cheeses to pass the level !!

name: Little Hearts
description: Turn-based strategy simulation RPG in a fantasy world of swords and sorcery, featuring light dot-drawing animation.

name: Time Storm
description: Use your ability to go back in time to overcome obstacles and reach your goal. Are you ready to help your future self?

name: Arnold
description: Control a spaceship and fight against treacherous aliens.

name: Bullet Heat
description: BULLET HEAT is a virtual reality arena shooter and sandbox game. Interact with different weapons, fight off waves of enemies, and experiment with different physics and building mechanics.

name: Xing Yuan Lv Ren: Star wish traveler
description: "XingYuanLvRen - Star wish traveler" is a visual novel game with an otherworldly adventure theme.The story follows the adventures of a teenager who is summoned to an alien world to help the world defend itself against the "Day of Approval".

name: Bouncing Traveler
description: Bouncing Traveler - a platformer game for accuracy, made in 3D graphics.

name: Jumperbird
description: The boxes you do not crash will earn you points. Each score you earn will prove how good your reflexes are. You have to go through the space between the boxes.

name: Falafel Restaurant Simulator
description: Start your own Falafel shop in a big city and manage your business to make your own successes story

name: Rise 2.0
description: Procedural generation infinite runner with a focus on relaxing game play alongside a calming sound track. Rise to greater heights with each attempt and unlock new content as you progress.

name: Monads II
description: The second work following [Monads], released in 2019.This is a puzzle-tactics game without RNGs, so you can revert your action anytime. Find your own solution of prepared stages, following the story of 6 protagonists.

name: Demetria Spirit
description: The key to progress is to grow your Plant and tend to your animals! If you don’t. You will serve your customers and Design your own house and farm!

name: Doomer's Adventure
description: An platformer game about collecting stuff to bear with reality. Just like life, this game is short and meaningless, filled with existential questions of being.

name: Evasive Maneuvers
description: Evasive Maneuvers is a team-based online multiplayer spaceship arena. 2-8 players are split into 2 teams; runners & hunters. Runners attempt to pickup enough energy to power up the warp gate to allow their escape. Hunters attempt to prevent runners from escaping by using their ramming ships.

name: Crazy Race
description: Crazy Race is a fast-paced arcade racing game with low poly graphics and great physics.

name: Anima Forest
description: Play as a cute animal and try to survive as long as you can in the forest. Gather resources during the day - craft various equipments and build structures to help defend yourself at night.

name: Beat Flip
description: A fast paced casual game that will test your reflexes and mind.

name: Winter Wastelands
description: Winter Wastelands is a sci-fi fantasy action-adventure game about fighting bosses, exploring unique locations, gathering items that come with different costumes and special abilities, and trying to make it back home.

name: Thy Creature
description: Thy Creature is a dark fantasy story adventure game. Experience the fascinating story with a variety of mazes, fun shoot-'em-up style, infatuating dark-fantasy. This is based on the work of Mary Shelley's novel "Frankenstein: Or the Modern Prometheus".

name: Rust Raiders
description: Become a robot pirate captain in this roguelike deckbuilding game and defeat the evil Captain LeCrank. Forge cards to improve their power, augment your ship with gadgets and build your own Deck! Experience the unique card system crafted exclusively for Rust Raiders.

name: Bull et Hell
description: Bull et Hell is the top down shooter where time moves only when you move. outnumbered and outgunned, shoot your enemies, and maneuver through a chaotic storm of slow-motion bullets.

name: Cougar's Quest for Freedom
description: CQFF is the first game I made with AGS. I made the game for MAGS, a monthly AGS adventure game creation competition. The guideline was to make a game with animals as characters, so I decided that my cat attempting to escape from the house would make a good little quick game. I actually spent WAY more time than I expected on it, but I'm pretty happy with the end result.

name: Stinky feet: The adventure of BigFoot
description: You wake up in a strange place reduced to a six-toed foot load of enemies are trying to wash you! FIght them by wall jumping and shooting your extra toe at them, while you try to find your way out.

name: DarKnot
description: DarKnot is a game about the extermination of monsters on the streets of a foggy city. Here you will find insidious opponents, dynamic battles and puzzles of various degrees of difficulty. It's up to you to decide in what style to play the game.

name: Grand Chase Classic
description: GrandChase Classic is a free side-scrolling online action RPG with anime inspired graphics. It's a re-relase of the classic 2003 game with menu and graphics reworked and rebalanced characters.

name: Goodnight, Lily
description: Escape the dark by navigating through nightmares made reality. Follow the light and find your way home as you are hounded by your worst fears.

name: Zombies Everywhere
description: When you are holed up alone in a room for 100 days, your food and strength are running out. Outside the corridor, the Walking Dead are walking around. From time to time, there are screams of pain and terror. If there is a future at the end of the world, what will you do on the 101st day?

name: Plan Z
description: A first-person action game that represents an epic battle of survivors against hordes of mutants.

name: Danger Zombies
description: Put down all the zombies coming towards you! Collect points. A zombie game that won't tire you on quarantine days.

name: Liao Zhai Sou Shen Ji Guo Feng Qia Pai
description: Sin descripción

name: The Loneliest Artist
description: The Loneliest Artist will take you on a journey that will help educate you on mental health and how to cope with it. This game will teach you about different types of mental health by playing special puzzles.

name: Loopomotive
description: Loopomotive is a short casual train survival game where you drive a train stuck in a loop that never stops! You can accelerate or slow down the train, but never stop it. Avoid accidents to complete levels!

name: Outsourcing: IT company simulator
description: Outsourcing - IT Company Simulator is a cheerful and challenge management game, you can build your own company from sketch, hire employees with different traits, help your employee improve, and they will help your company improve.

name: 408: The Forbidden Room
description: 408 - The Forbidden Room is a psychological horror game, inspired by a horror movie story, discover the mysteries behind this Hotel, and try not to be just another victim.

name: The Simplest Game
description: The Simplest Game is a 2D logic game with pixel graphics. Yes, this is actually the simplest game ever! Every level in this game is the same. But try to get out of the level and not break your brain!

name: Solys
description: Solys is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS, where teams fight to destroy one anothers' base. The last team standing wins the game. Collect resources, fly powerful spaceships to reach other planets, build your base, setup defenses and buy weapons to dominate the solar system.

name: 西游外传
description: Sin descripción

name: The Adventures of John Killbot
description: A fun 2D shooter rpg with a small story and really fast action.

name: Galactic Refugees
description: A beginner-friendly old-school shmup meets bullet hell

name: The Falling Tower
description: Where did you come from, and where will you go. What's the destination of your journey? Maybe you can find your own answer in this game. -----Welcome, to this magic world.

name: Hijacker Jack
description: One day just a simple man, lives outcast in the jungle - the other day wealthy and wanted. Money changes everyone? Do you know who you can trust and who is a wolf in sheep's clothing? Play this unique real-time action packed FMV-FPS game to figure it out! Famous. Rich. Wanted. Live like Jack!

name: Factorization
description: In Factorization, you must plan and build a factory capable of producing ever more complex resources. You focus on designing optimal production lines while carefully balancing your budget. In the meantime your workers build your designs and carry out the day-to-day tasks in your factory.

name: Flying Fury
description: A side scrolling shooter with a bullet hell influence. Does it explode? Yes. Everything does. Enemies show their battle damage through having chunks be blown off. There are multiple enemies all with unique behaviours, all which are designed in junction with each other.

name: Specular Stranded
description: Specular Stranded is a hardcore, stealth/action, cinematic Sci-Fi experience. You wake up alone, stranded out in space. An enemy has boarded your ship. Your crew are either dead or missing. Hide in the shadows, take your enemies out without leaving a trace. That is how you survive.

name: Sweet Halloween
description: Sweet Halloween is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Under the Sea
description: Under the Sea is a 3D survival mini game based on time attack, race against time to survive, collect the lights and gain time to live in a world full of enemies.

name: Cat's Menace
description: The dark story from the life of cats and people. Who will own the city?

name: Catch the Stars: Japan
description: Click on the right star, solve the puzzles and be enchanted by these beautiful Japanese landscapes. CATch the Stars: Japan is a beautiful minimalist puzzle with a relaxing, pleasant and original soundtrack.

name: Vaccine A
description: Firewall, vaccine, cleaner... Place various blocks to protect your CPU! Vaccine A is a sandbox defense game, filled with parody of various programs.

name: Blocked Out: Red V Blue
description: Destroy, build, fight, and capture! Welcome to a voxel team-based first-person shooter that lets you dictate how you play. Blocked Out: Red V Blue gives you the opportunity to battle it out with 15 other players to see which team has what it takes to prevail!

name: Coffee flavor of love
description: Sweet love begins in the coffee shop. Office romances of coffee shop employees. This is a visual novel game with two endings.

name: Wheelie King Online
description: 'Wheelie King Online' is a realistic wheelie bike game for everyone. Our freestyle stunts app lets you wheelie race anywhere. Try the challenge of nitro bike drift game or upgrade, and customise your bike with paint and decals.

name: Crossroads of Helmia
description: In Crossroads of Helmia you will explore the world, meet its inhabitants and build your own team. Find the interesting Characters of Helmia and recruit them to join your forces. Build the team to fit your playstyle, defensive or aggressive and defeat your enemies.

name: Kanały '44
description: The game takes place during WWII Warsaw Uprising of 1944, showing it from a different perspective - that of an underground courier, braving the sewers under the war-torn Polish capital, in order to deliver crucial reports from Śródmieście to Mokotów district. Let the deadly mission begin!

name: Lost Eve
description: Lost EVE is a dark, atmospheric puzzle-platformer, the story of which unfolds in a post-apocalyptic future about 3 thousand years after a nuclear war.

name: Decabristov Street
description: Take a walk through one of the courtyards of the city of Moscow on Dekabristov Street. Four houses surrounding the yard, a skating rink in the middle, a few garages and solitude...

name: Yet Another Hard Game
description: Yet Another Hard Game is yet another hard game. Shocker, I know. YAHG is a jump and run game that is hard.

name: Dungeon Chronicle
description:
Travel through unlimited floors of increasingly difficult enemies while collecting vast amounts of unique loot!

Become the ultimate hero using various weapons (Dual Swords, Long sword, Pistol, Shotgun, Wand and Staff)
Hire and organize mercenaries to create the strongest party.
Upgrade skills and create a melee focused warrior or mix and match and create a hybrid character of your making!

Explore the dungeon. And survive. How far can you go?!

name: Innerworld
description: Horror-RPG game with anthropomorphic casts called “Beastchild”. Defeat monsters and cults tring to kill Nicolas, and rescue his friends and family. It features speedy, and tense battles with ATB system. Analyze the enemy and gain advantages. Make full use of the items and destroy them.

name: Fleeting World
description: Fleeting World - a city-building game where the landscape around you is constantly changing. Build a settlement, collect resources, adjust it to the changing terrain, avoid natural hazards, offer the resources to the gods.

name: Yupitergrad: Sneaki Peaki
description: Sneaki Peaki is a special, free edition of Yupitergrad - a Virtual Reality game with spatial acrobatics, wacky humor and lots of sovietpunk adventures!

name: Cross Stitch Casper
description: Most likely the only cross stitched adventure game in existence. Cross Stitch Casper is a game that focuses on story and characters. The homely embroidered graphics are in contrast to the bleak home of main protagonist. As player you control little Casper. But you're not him. You're just observing the world he's living in and the struggles he has to endure. How will he manage to get through his daily live's struggles? Will he at all? The only person sympathizing with him seems to be his grandmother. Then again, how much can an old woman do?

name: Cliffhanger: Challenger of Tomorrow
description: Punch out Fascists and unravel conspiracies in this explosive pulp adventure set in a wild 1930s world of airships, fast cars and two-fisted action!

name: Street Sniper
description: Give it your best shot with Street Sniper First Person Shooter (FPS Shooting) game and take contract to shoot all the unjust dishonest and make the world a better place to live.

name: Tormenta do Tempo
description: Tormenta do Tempo is an Hack N Slash Action RPG about Time Travel. Find out all about the origin of time travel, annihilate hordes of enemies, choose from 3 types of classes, grow your talent tree, loots, and try to save the Past, Present and Future, from a cruel fate.

name: Starveling Way
description: Starveling Way is a tactical turn-based game set in a zombie apocalypse

name: Kingdoms of Myth
description: Turn-based strategy game depicting a high variety of historical factions including mythological elements. Start on classic antiquity and move your faction to Renaissance to defeat your enemies! Build an army with unique units all over the world lead by powerful heroes with unique skills!

name: Spherical alliance
description: Spherical alliance is an old-school arcade action platformer inspired by the Arcade classic Solomon's Key. It adds puzzle and strategy elements as well as some magic. It also includes a 2 player coop mode. If you like retro 2D platformers you should get Spherical alliance!

name: Dice Tactics
description: A video game that plays like your favorite tabletop RPG game. With every roll, fate is placed in your hands.

name: Cutthroat Cove
description: Welcome to Cutthroat Cove. Get ready to pillage and plunder, or be prepared to walk the plank. In this open world pirate thriller you can craft, engage in combat with the nasty locals, and follow clues to unlock the secrets of the Old World.

name: Obsolete Souls
description: Obsolete Souls is a turn based RPG with a touch of hip-hop! Journey through Earth Alpha with a cast of goons trying to save the universe from it's inevitable demise.

name: Run Dummy Run
description: Run Dummy Run is a classic 2D runner with a side view. Test your reaction, make the doll jump in time and overcome obstacles and enemies. On the levels you can find special perks that change the gameplay.

name: Unionatic
description: Unionatic is a real-time strategy game that deals with the ancient war of humans and creatures, while also defending your village by building and managing your troops.

name: Auto Kitchen
description: Build and run your own automated kitchen to turn ingredients into delicious meals!

name: Keeper of the Day and Night
description: You didn’t expect so many essays sophomore year. Or so many hellhound attacks. This year is shaping up to be a killer—hopefully not literally.

name: Deathroids
description: Remember the golden age of arcades playing a game with all the classic 80's/90's space-shooting features. See how far you can go by destroying all enemy robots that are ready to planet earth attack.

name: Chinese Frontiers
description: Discover life in a Chinese settlement founded during the construction of the Great Wall. Acquire new skills, learn to work smart, and be clever. When the enemy comes, you need to be prepared.

name: Shotgun, Dungeons, Laser Traps
description: A first person puzzle shooter. Shoot boxes, push bombs, fend off enemies, find a way out of laser-mechanical traps.

name: Struggle Offensive
description: With the coming together of anti-government groups, the Orange Star, Terrorist group was born. This terrorist group is aiming to take over by overthrowing the government, and they are creating nationwide chaos to implement what they want.

name: Moxie's Lemon
description: Moxie's Lemon is a short cinematic platformer about pettiness and frustration.

name: Wrestling With Emotions: New Kid on the Block
description: It’s time to kick ass and break hearts! Wrestling with Emotions: New Kid on the Block is a wrestling dating sim that combines elements of RPGs and punk games to create a uniquely anarchic experience.

name: Cube Runk
description: Cyberpunk adventure game about the fight of a orphan Drew against powerful corporations.

name: Tip Top
description: Tip Top is an arcade-style roguelike climbing game that will take you on adventures to all corners of the globe.

name: Big Mushroom RPG
description: 极简化角色扮演游戏制作工具，0代码可视化编辑

name: Emerald Lake
description: The Emerald Lake is a children's camp located next to the lake. This camp has long been abandoned due to a series of strange events that happened a long time ago. The main character is Michael, went to this camp to find his brother.

name: GeometryBricks
description: It's a puzzle game with a small amount of arcade elements. In the game, a player controls two heroes both at the same time. In some levels heroes move opposite to each other. The game consists of 35 levels with lots of different mechanics. The game will be available on PC and mobile.

name: Full Pawer
description: Unlock the power within you in this epic Sandbox RTS adventure! Create lush environments, build impressive villages, and attempt to discover the dark past of Plystia.

name: Spark the Battle Dog
description: The boy Thomas contains the cure for zombie infection in his DNA, so he shouldn't be hurt. It's up to you to protect it from hordes of hectic zombies and other mutant animals. Upgrade your weapons, your camp and most importantly ...Survive! Are you prepared?

name: Easy Red 2
description: Fight in massive battles between infantry, armored vehicles, tanks, cannons and planes. Realistically manage your weapons and equipment, coordinate with your squad, and tactically navigate large, fully destructible open world maps. Experience the WW2 in single-player, PVP and Co-Op.

name: New Yankee 9: The Evil Spellbook
description: Travel back to the days of King Arthur to defeat an evil spell book with plans to claim Camelot as its own! As you race to remove towering obstacles, gather abundant resources and restore razed villages, each step will bring you closer to victory!

name: Coldage
description: Coldage is a strategic card game about choices and consequences. Following a group of five Protectors sent on a quest to investigate the Refinery. You decide which characters respond to the event cards and how the story progresses as a consequence.

name: Shooter for Dummies
description: Shooter for Dummies puts players in the perspective of a dummy. Play the most iconic FPS PvP maps: CTF, Team Deathmatch, Kill confirmed... where the winning is not the common goal: The dummy with less receiving damage wins! But don't worry dummies, you can punch players almost off the map!

name: Beat Reality
description: Beat Reality is an new rhythm experience you have never seen before! Use your hands to explode the beats as they spawn in front of you – every orb indicates which hand you need to use and the rotation you need to match.

name: Galaxy Arena
description: Immerse yourself in a virtual reality world with Captain Gordon and battle alien invaders

name: VR Meditation SkyRun
description: You are welcome to meditate and enjoy the atmosphere of peace and phantastic run of time in a silence high in mountains.

name: Any Candy
description: Any Candy is a simple match 3 game, tap screen drag and drop the candy get high score. Made in Construct 2. Enjoy the game!The game has nice graphics and music.Collect as many Jelly as you can and get the most points.Forward!

name: Metal Strike
description: We knock down iron cans with balls so that they fall to the ground.

name: Mr. Sun's Hatbox
description: Mr. Sun’s Hatbox is a slapstick, roguelite platformer about getting the job done, no matter the cost. Upgrade your HQ, your team, and your tools so you can take on increasingly dangerous (and ridiculous) missions in pursuit of not only the hat you’ve lost, but as many hats as you can handle.

name: Crime Scene Technician
description: Become a Crime Scene Investigator, gather evidence, and connect not obvious facts which will lead you to solve the crime and find the guilty! Don't let criminals get more innocent victims!

name: Slav Dangerous
description: Brawl your way through a locked down city district. Set units' behavior like: how often to use their special ability, how close they keep to their leader or which units to attack first. Place flags and make your units guard them.

name: Galaxy Kart
description: Gear up, strap in, and prepare for the ultimate VR racing experience with Galaxy Kart VR. Whether you're a seasoned racer or a newcomer to the genre, get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey through the cosmos where victory awaits at every turn!

name: Crawler
description: Crawler is a short / modern, retro style Dungeon Crawler experience, you find yourself alone, inside an old castle.

name: Cyber War Apocalypse
description: This unique open-world game is a 1st/3rd person shooter, survival/horror role-playing game. The goal is to Survive. Overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst & exhaustion. Build shelter. Use Advanced Crafting. Clear enemy Outpost. Survive solo in Campaign Mode or with friends in Multiplayer Mode.

name: Lawgivers II
description: Lawgivers II is a political sandbox game which offers multiple ways to experience the process of ruling and approving bills. Start your political adventure from the very bottom and perhaps one day, lead your nation to become the most influential in the world.

name: 2236 A.D. Secretary Stories
description: A prequel to 2236 A.D. which features a nonsensical story between man and AI that seems heartwarming but may actually be heartwarming. In other words, it's a visual novel about how Masuko is cute.

name: In Cold Dark
description: An interactive point-and-click space story about rediscovering a life, our friendships, our choices and regrets.

name: Mantle
description: An emotional journey through dark depths. You'll need tight platforming, a unique teleport mechanic, and patience to return to the surface.

name: 100 Hidden Snails
description: Hidden object game in a surreal style. Extremely hard!

name: Keyboard Master
description: Keyboard Master is a game in which you can test and improve your typing abilities while having a good time. While you play the game and trying to prove your self as a master, a pleasant procedural generated piano note sounds for each key.

name: The Glassfire Amulet
description: Fantasy-themed adventure rpg where the player leads a band of mercenaries into the sexy dungeons beneath the kingdom in hopes to recover a stolen powerful talisman. Monsters must be defeated, shady deals must be struck, and hot priestesses must be seduced.

name: Tanks in Labyrinth
description: The point of this game is to have a great time with your friends on the same computer! You play as a tank. Every man for himself. You can play with a top view, or you can play in the first person! Interesting bonuses: health, hammer, rocket, machinegun, blast, wall.

name: Going the Distance
description: Build and upgrade paper planes to celebrate the memories of your lost brother to help with your grief. In this launcher game you will have different crafts and locations to re-live the best memories to help let him go.

name: Ragdoll Racers
description: Once upon a time there was a group of children with free time to play. Ragdoll Racers is the best game about RC cars dragging toys around the neighborhood!

name: Warriors of the Nile 2
description: Warriors of the Nile 2 is a fast-paced Roguelite strategy game. This time the Warriors are equipped with more unique combat style. Freely decide the adventure route, choose the skill slab to strengthen the character, lead your squad, and repel the Roman legion.

name: Project Pulse
description: A co-op rhythm action game taking the rhythm elements of combat and pulling them into a thematic world. Play with your friends as characters that represent Melody, Bass, Harmony, and Percussion. Fight your way through your city and complete missions to build different musical weapons!

name: Gold Dust
description: Gold Dust - is a hardcore adventure in the spirit of games of nineties. Everything looks like in shooters of nineties except one thing – you will fight with evil using swords!

name: Nice Spice
description: A horror action-platformer RPG. Queer furry folk on their own journeys find one another and quickly form friendships and band together to face monsters! The story will feature themes of mental health, sexuality, queer comradery, and finding a sense of place in a hostile world.

name: Lords of Nether
description: Tired of playing the hero? Take up the mantle of a dreaded Dark Lord instead! Lords of Nether is a Dungeon Management game, a hybrid of RTS and God Game genres in which you build deadly dungeons and control armies of fiendish creatures to conquer the world of Man.

name: Pyramid Rush
description: This is a diverse puzzle-platformer, that constantly breaks the fourth wall. Resolve physics-based puzzles, go through challenging platformer levels and beat bosses! This game was intended to be a simple "Indiana Jones" rip-off, but something went wrong and it is YOUR mission to fix the game!

name: The Last Earth Man
description: A refreshing bow angle shooting game

name: Dacey in the Dark: Prelude
description: It's a game about fate. This chapter deals with the melancholy we cherish towards times long gone. I'm planing to release more chapters. THIS GAME IS THE WINNER OF MAGS NOVEMBER 2010 (even though it was the only entry - still you should play it!) PLOT: After a fight with her father Dacey takes a walk in the garden, where she meets a most unlikely companion

name: Brave Ball
description: Brave Ball is an action game where you kill monsters. With a soccer ball. By using really over the top anime shots. There is also a story of manipulation and betrayal to finish up one weird game.

name: Penimorta
description: You are a Wizard. Being imprisoned in Penimorta, a maximum security prison, has little appeal. Naturally, you've decided to bust out. The problem is... between every floor of Penimorta is a Corporeal Beast. Can you escape?

name: Queen of Honor
description: Queen of Honor - is a classical 2D platformer with surviving elements where you have to do different levels as a brave queen Hola.

name: Tokyo Re:Connect
description: Spring is the season of first meetings. Begin your new life in the city of Tokyo as Shindou Touki. Meet many colorful characters, forge romances, and live out your high-school days, in this interactive story with cutting-edge artwork and a moving soundtrack.

name: Little Dragons Cafe: Limited Edition
description: Little Dragons Café is the latest tour de’ force from Yasuhiro Wada, founder of the Harvest Moon series. The story begins with a twin brother and sister running a small café with their mother. All was peaceful and routine until one morning the twins discovered that their mother fell into a deep sleep and wouldn’t wake up. Suddenly, an old wizard appears and tells the twins that their mother is gravely ill and that they must raise a dragon in order to save her. Working together with their three quirky staff members (waiter, waitress, and chef), the two siblings must raise a dragon and manage the family business while at the same time discover what is causing their mother’s illness and find a cure.

name: Sengo Muramasa DX: Guren no Kettou - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: Sengo Muramasa DX: Guren no Kettou
Artbook
Soundtrack CD

name: Madden NFL 16: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Vikings: Ragnarök Edition
description: In a desperate move, Odin has reanimated Gunborg, Seagurd, Hedgy and Caw-Kaa, four of the most terrifying Viking zombies who have ever lived. This putrid team will embark on a mission in the most epic of worlds. Not only to recover the magical eye, but also to honor its roots. ZOMBIE VIKINGS: RAGNAROK includes: 2 extra characters, 5 combat arenas and a digital art book.

name: Do Not Feed the Monkeys: Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: Do Not Feed The Monkeys
T-shirt
Badge
Artbook

name: Labyrinth Life: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: Omega Labyrinth Life
Collector's Box
3D Mousepad
Metal Case Futurepack
Alternative Art Cover
OST CD
Limited DLC: 7 Kinds of Weapon

name: Aonatsu Line: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: Aonatsu Line
B2 Tapestry "Miki Kousaka”
Original Soundtrack
Acrylic Key Chain "Yui Nakategawa"
Set of Mini Autograph Cards

name: Madden NFL 17: Deluxe Edition
description: Take your team all the way in Madden NFL 17 and put yourself at the center of your team’s Championship run in the deepest Franchise mode to-date. Driven by the most balanced gameplay yet, along with fun and fresh ways to play modes such as Ultimate Team and Draft Champions, Madden NFL 17 is the most complete Madden…ever.

name: Damsel: Chapter One - Stress on the Tress
description:
Poor Damsel...her life was so perfect back at the castle, riding her pony, brushing her hair and visiting the spa. But now her royal princessliness has been kidnapped by the quasi-evil, fat little middle aged wizard Dorkus, and trapped high in a tower with no doors! She's held out as long as she can, but if she doesn't escape tonight, Dorkus will force her to marry him! What's a girl in distress to do?

Well, wait for rescue, obviously. But when rescues go wrong, Damsels must do it for themselves!

Damsel is a short comedy adventure game, with full voice-acted dialogue. We hope you enjoy it, we had some really talented performers for it. :)

name: Yakuza Kiwami: Steelbook Edition
description: The year is 1995, and Kazuma Kiryu, the Dragon of Dojima, is an up-and-coming yakuza. A Lieutenant Advisor in the Tojo Clan's Dojima Family, his hard work has nearly earned him his own sub-family in this prestigious group.

name: Full Metal Panic! Fight! Who Dares Wins: Specialist Box Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: Full Metal Panic! Fight: Who Dares Wins
Full Metal Panic: Invisible Victory Special Contents Blu-ray Disc
Full Metal Panic: Special Novel
Special Audio Drama CD and Game Edition “Megami no Rainichi: Date Hen”
“Megami no Rainichi: Date Hen” Replica Autographed Mini Script
Full Metal Panic! Fight: Who Dares Wins Special-Illustrated Box
Tall case to store Blu-ray and CD

name: Yoru no Nai Kuni 2: Shingetsu no Hanayome - Premium Box
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: Yoru no Nai Kuni 2 Shingetsu no Hanayome
Yoru no Nai Kuni 2 Visual Book
Yoru no Nai Kuni 2 Official Soundtrack
Character Poster
Special Character 3D Card
Character Card Set

name: NHL 21: Ultimate Edition

name: Farewell
description: Farewell is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Relic, a girl who refuses to leave her room and progress through the game by collecting Mementos and Flowers which are required to unlock the game's endings.

name: Dream Book
description: Dream Book is a Yume Nikki fangame, following Gorotsuki and her dreams.

name: Anamorphosis
description:
Anamorphosis is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore Kikei's dream world and find Personalities, the game's version of effects. Every single Personality turns the protagonist into something that bears no resemblance to their original self, an unusual feature for a fangame.

Before version -0.75, the game was made with RPG Maker 2003, until it was remade in RPG Maker VX Ace.

name: Musou Yuugi
description: Musou Yuugi is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game seems to have a theme of Japanese folklore/theatre. It focuses on exploration and collection effects, but ornaments for Shirayuki's dream room can also be bought from the market sellers in certain worlds.

name: Nijuu Yuumu
description:
Nijuu Yuumu is a Yume Nikki fangame. The game has a total of 15 effects to collect and no ending. Generally, the game's imagery sticks to a naive and simple style, which usually portrays the world seen by a child.

The game features a young girl known as Kizutsuki and her other personality, Kitsutsuki. Some effects can only be used by a certain personality or differ depending on which personality you use.

The money system in this game is different from most fangames, as you can receive money only by finding it. Nijuu Yumuu also doesn't have any vending machines, instead, you can spend your money by buying plant pots in a flower shop.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams
description: Beautiful Jigsaw Puzzle game where you can design the room you play in!

name: Shoujo Kidan
description: "You" who got lost in a strange land, will hear a ghost story from a eccentric girl who lives there, relieving that vague memory.

name: Shoujo Gidan
description:
Waking up in a strange prison, "you" will work with a girl who is also there, to escape from the building.

A sequel to Shoujo Kidan.

description: Become the God of Destruction in a unique real time strategy game utilizing PS VR. Breed monsters to invade human territories, seen in a diorama-like view through the eyes of the God of Destruction. Together with Badman and Badmella, work towards total world domination!

name: Death Mark: Experience Selection
description: The game’s story is based on a rumor that alleges that in Tokyo’s “H” district those who receive a death seal will die. There have been cases in which people that had a mysterious mark appear suddenly on their body have died without an explanation, causing the spreading of the rumor.Some think that the seal is caused by encountering a ghost, or being affected by a curse. Those who have the death seals are suddenly called to a certain villa. The protagonist is one of them, and is greeted by a beautiful talking doll that welcomes him to “Kujou Mansion.” The doll warns him that he will die if he doesn’t manage to do something about it.

name: The Caligula Effect: Overdose - Limited Edition
description: Mobius. An idyllic world that exists for the sake of letting people forget about the pain and problems of reality. In this world created by a sentient vocaloid program, μ, reality and fantasy has become blurred, allowing people to relive their high school years in bliss. Yet in this seemingly beautiful and perfect world, something is amiss. Escape from this false paradise with your fellow students and return to reality in The Caligula Effect: Overdose!

name: Iffermoon
description:
The day the Iffermoon crashed, the world changed forever.

In Iffermoon, you will explore your new world and meet many unique characters who will be willing to join your party and help you on your quest to defeat Cosmose. Customize your party into a formidable fighting team for action based battles, engaging in physical combat as well as traditional rpg style commands.

There are also three complete games within this game, accessible through arcade machines, each with their own rewards to improve your abilities on your central quest.

name: Stellar Gun
description:
Your objective is to defeat the cosmic demons that have invaded your space. One by one, you must confront them and kill them, earning weapons, money and medals along the way. Who is behind it all? You will have to discover that for yourself.

You move your spaceship using the keys W,A,S,D as arrow keys. The mouse controls your target. This is a two-handed game. One hand will control your ship's position (while using W,A,S,D) and the other hand will use the mouse to target enemies. Space bar is used to respawn after losing a life. Left-clicking your mouse fires your weapon. Right-clicking your mouse cycles through your weapons. Current weapon and remaining ammo are indicated by an icon in the lower left portion of the screen.

When you lose a life, a flashing cursor will appear in your place. Control this cursor like your ship and position it out of harm's way. When the cursor is in a safe location, press space bar to respawn your next life. If you do not hit space bar, your next life will respawn at the cursor in 5 seconds.

New weapons and extra lives must be purchased using money acquired from battle. After each victory or defeat, you will return to your Main Menu screen. Here you can buy ammunition and extra lives for your next venture. Purchasing extra lives becomes increasingly expensive depending on how many you already have. This screen is also where you select your level. Levels 1-4 must be cleared before 5 can be played. Once 5 is cleared, you can play 6. Levels can be revisited even after you have beaten them for more cash or to retrieve missing medals. A medal is rewared for clearing a specific level without losing a life. Cleared levels are shown as grey icons, while uncleared levels are in color.

Status information is saved to your C: drive. Things like ammunition, cleared stages, and medals are saved automatically so that you can pick up where you left off at a later time.

name: Primal Rage II
description:
Primal Rage II is the cancelled sequel to Primal Rage. It started development in 1996 and was set to be released in 1997, but the game was cancelled due to the shrinking popularity of arcades. The game would feature avatars of the gods as playable characters. Necrosan trapped the gods so they couldn't fight him, so the avatars had to save the gods by fighting each other to reach Necrosan. If the player were to beat Necrosan then they would get an ending. Only one cabinet of the game is known to exist, and it can be found at the Galloping Ghost Arcade in Brookfield, Illinois.

As of 02/11/2017, the emulation of the game is fully functional, thanks to YouTube user GruntZilla94.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Year 3 Advanced Edition
description: Year 3 will have four Seasons and eight new operators. There will become changes to the content of the seasons compared to what was released in the previous years of post-launch support for Rainbow Six. Year 3 of the popular first-person shooter's post-launch content will begin with two new operators and the Outbreak event, grouped under the name 'Operation Chimera'.

name: Desert War
description: Desert War - 2d slasher, in this game you slash enemies with your sword, use magic, rolls and your reaction to defeat enemies who are growing with each new wave, but you also pump your hero, his weapons and magic.

name: Auto Mechanic
description: Auto Mechanic is a pixel arcade game where in each level you need to think with your head before jumping. Find a support in the form of wheels and a sofa. When pushing off, be vigilant, there may be traps.

name: Chuckle Phrase Builder
description: World of LOL is an online multiplayer game where the objective is to build the funniest sentence with bits of dark or wacky humour. Political correctness has no place in World of LOL !

name: Temple with Traps
description: Go through all the traps of the temple and reach the end.

name: 69 Yuki Love
description: 69 Yuki Love Allows you to plunge into an exciting and fairly simple puzzle. Your devoted girl Yuki the cat, together with relaxing music and meditative gameplay, will allow to have a good rest after work .

name: Falling As Lightning
description: Plan and build a deck of cards to represent your government, then use the structure you created to mobilize the military and unite warring star systems under the guiding light of your political ideology.

name: Visual Novel Sisters
description: Visual novel based on the tale of two sisters.

name: Zoey: My Hentai Sex Doll
description: Meet Zoey, the beautiful girl from the next door. Do your best to conquer her love! She will adapt to please your need and offer you a one to one session with unlimited possibilities. Spend all the time you want with her but don't exceed your limits.

name: Mart and Tetra
description: "I will make you Hero"...A weak girl adventurer who was tricked with a proposal and a girl ex-Demon king. Switch these two to defeat the Demon king(or Hero)

name: Neighbor Diana
description: Neighbor Diana is a first-person adventure. In this game you spy on your neighbor Diana. At some point, you get the idea to put a webcam in Diana's room to monitor her. You will need to solve puzzles and complete various tasks to set up a webcam.

name: Girls Overboard
description: Join the cute anime girls of Girls Overboard on Kawaii Island for a Wet n' Wild vacation! People from across the world travel to the island chain of Kawaii in search of recreation, relaxation, and above all, romance. An idle crafting-style dating sim with animated 2D artwork!

name: Aebal
description: Aebal is a procedural generated rhythm game where your goal is to avoid the red enemies. The more enemies on the board when your hit, the more points you lose. With your own music in this bullet hell, there's nothing but the music to defeat you.

name: Fiscal Kombat
description: A beat 'em up, flash game featuring the political candidate of the 2017 French Election Jean-Luc Mélenchon.

name: Hot Brass: Operator Edition

name: No Longer Home: Farewell Edition
description: The Farewell Edition includes No Longer Home, and its available soundtracks Immerse yourself in the lives of Bo and Ao and learn about their dreams, frustrations and fears. Welcome the magic of the everyday and somewhat extraordinary.

description: Sin descripción

description:
Edition offers the ultimate experience for those who want to immerge into the ancient Roman era with:

- The game's full soundtrack
- The digital map, hand-drawn by Francesca Baerald
- Sentius statue 3D-printing file

name: Hundred Days: Grape Lab
description: Grape Lab is a tool that allows you to create customized grape varieties and wines that can be used in game.

name: No One Lives in Heaven: Digital Deluxe Edition

name: Potion Tycoon
description: Potion Tycoon is a management simulator with a witchy twist! Build and develop your very own magic shop. Manage resources, set up production lines, mix potions and sell them smartly to stay ahead of the competition. Welcome to the potion business!

name: Jars
description: Jars is a strategy game featuring puzzles and elements of tower defense. Join Victor in his spooky yet endearing world and prepare for a quest to uncover the secrets of his family's basement. Will you save the world or get grounded by mother?

name: Greak: Memories of Azur - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Knight: Mission - Terminate Resistance
description: Sin descripción

name: Ark of Loif
